subject: Attacks in this group
author: Peter James Haviland ACCH
full_text:
Will not be tolerated ANYMORE!!! We can argue theory and debate topics all
day but I will not allow personal attacks on this board any longer. Those
that do will find themselves warned ONCE then I will help them update their
resumes and wish them well on the second issue. LIFE IS TOO SHORT LADIES
AND GENTLEMEN. I hate to be an asshole about it but its time to put away
childish things.

Peter James Haviland
